mapper.select: select t.* from t_cagent_ysepay t,t_user a,t_user_type b,t_user_channel c where t.id = c.payment_id and a.type_id = b.id and b.id = c.typeid and a.uid = #{uid} and FIND_IN_SET(#{payId},c.channel) and FIND_IN_SET(c.payment_id,b.onlinepay_id) and t.status=0 order by t.ca_index desc,t.id asc
SELECT tcy.* FROM t_user tu LEFT JOIN t_user_channel tuc ON tu.type_id = tuc.typeid LEFT JOIN t_cagent_ysepay tcy ON tuc.payment_id = tcy.id WHERE tu.uid = #{uid} AND tcy.id = #{pid} LIMIT 1;

#{id}
order by ca_index desc
